title: Labryinth full of shops and cafes
text: The Little Venice is the highlight of Greece, with its beautiful promenade, quaint cafes and antique shops. The cobbled pathways line up little white houses with coloured doors and windows, with few small staircases going up and down around the corners. You can pick some souvenirs here. At night its a great place to dine and party, as the whole town comes alive. In the mornings, its a beautiful lazy little fishing village.

title: Beautiful temple of Athens on a hill surrounded by lovely cityscape
text: The temple of Athens is like a jewel in the crown, with its sandstone coloured pillars, standing tall on the hill. Even though in ruins, one can imagine the glory it must have once been.

title: Shopping in old town China
text: YuYuan is a juxtaposition of old world China and its new world counterpart with the beautiful lake and gardens surrounded by gizmos and branded clothes. But its beautiful. It has still maintained its old charm. Look out for the small stores selling Chinese dolls and antiques.

title: Wonderful view of the city and the riverfront
text: Lovely weather, cool breeze and lot of selfie opps.... this place is a must visit when on a trip to Shanghai

title: Wonderfully fresh, organic, healthy salads, soups and smoothies
text: This place is really popular for the weight-watchers, as there is always waiting for place to sit. But it's totally worth the wait as they have an amazing variety of vegan, vegetarian and non-veg salads. You can also choose your own ingredients and make the salad that you like! The names of the dishes are also unique... Protein packed, Ironman etc.

title: Interesting place with warm hospitality
text: Very comfortable and beautiful decor made up of old trunks and colorful lighting. The service was very good. We ordered Paella, Crispy Chicken, Pasta. My daughter did not like one of the Korean chicken dishes - it was immediately replaced with another dish to match her palate.

title: Few seconds of rides after hours of waiting
text: Just like other Disneys, with some amazing rides - esp Pirates of the Carribean, Peter Pan. But very very long waiting queues - least 45 mins to 150+ mins. Even the Fast Track pass does not help. We went on 2 days, yet could not get entry into some of the major rides. Quite disappointed, actually.
